articles.description: After Gareth Southgate's resignation as England boss, BBC Sport looks at who could replace him.
articles.title: Next England Manager: Who will replace Gareth Southgate? Potter? Howe? Klopp? Guardiola? Pochettino? Tuchel? Carsley?

articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary from Sweden v England in a Euro 2025 qualifier.
articles.title: Euro 2025 qualifier: Sweden v England - LIVE - scores, radio & text

articles.description: Jesse Owens and Luz Long's embrace has become a defining image of Olympic sportsmanship, but it came with consequences
articles.title: Olympics: Jesse Owens and Luz Long and a message of hope

articles.description: Jude Bellingham praises Gareth Southgate as "easily one of the best coaches in the history of the national team" as tributes to the outgoing England manager pour in.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham leads tributes to Gareth Southgate as England manager departs

articles.description: When Bobby Locke coined his immortal phrase, ‘drive for show, putt for dough’, it was just another flag the great South African planted in the story of golf.
articles.title: Bobby Locke: The dark life of the golfer banned for being too good

articles.description: England recall pace bowler Mark Wood to their XI for the second Test against West Indies at Trent Bridge, starting on Thursday.
articles.title: England squad v West Indies: Mark Wood recalled for second Test

articles.description: Chelsea are investigating a video posted on social media by midfielder Enzo Fernandez which the French Football Federation say included an alleged "racist and discriminatory" chant.
articles.title: Chelsea investigating Enzo Fernandez video with alleged 'racist' chant

articles.description: Gareth Southgate leaves England with his head held high but ultimately having fallen short as manager, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Gareth Southgate leaves England as a nearly manager who led a nearly team'

articles.description: Tiger Woods says he turned up at Royal Troon jaded after watching news of the assassination attempt on former US President Donald Trump on his flight.
articles.title: The Open 2024: Tiger Woods missed sleep over Donald Trump assassination attempt

articles.description: Rafael Nadal's first singles match since losing in the first round of the French Open in May ends with a 6-3 6-4 win against Leo Borg in Sweden.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal marks singles return with win against Leo Borg at Swedish Open
